A question with too few answers
A) Only answer
ANSWER: A

A) Question not started

ANSWER: Question not started

A good question
A) Correct
B) Incorrect
ANSWER: A

A question started but not finished
A) Correct-ish
B) Incorrect-ish

A second good question
A)Incorrect (No space)
B)Correct (No space)
ANSWER: B
